  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600

  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x820
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x804
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0

    LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (3,3) size 335x16
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 88x16
        text run at (0,0) width 88: "Sample text"
